definition: to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: How can you possibly charge a 7-year-old child with assault and battery?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼能將一個七歲的孩子判爲襲擊和毆打公職人員罪？

sentences.english: Twenty years ago roughly ten boys were arrested for assault for every one girl.
sentences.chinese: 二十年前，只有大約十個男孩因毆打一個女孩被逮捕。

sentences.english: Early one morning, Shmi was attacked and abducted by the savage Tusken Raiders.
sentences.chinese: 一天清晨，野蠻的塔斯肯襲擊者毆打併綁架了施密。

sentences.english: They set fire to Cao's residence and beat up Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 他們還防火焚燒了曹公館並毆打了章宗祥。

sentences.english: Nunchucks originated as a farm tool for beating weeds.
sentences.chinese: 最初是作爲一雙截棍毆打雜草農具。

sentences.english: China detains chief suspect in steel exec's death.
sentences.chinese: 涉嫌毆打通話鋼廠總經理致死的嫌犯在長春被捕。

sentences.english: You'll have to assault the boatyard and kill everyone there.
sentences.chinese: 您將有毆打該船廠和殺害人人有。

sentences.english: Mychal Bell faces aggravated battery charges in the beating of a white classmate.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾因毆打一名白人同學被控嚴重二級毆打罪。

sentences.english: Mychal Bell faces aggravated battery charges in the beating of a white classmate.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾因毆打一名白人同學被控嚴重二級毆打罪。

sentences.english: Police investigation, a man surnamed Lin admitted that he did beat Sumou.
sentences.chinese: 民警調查時，一名林姓男子承認，他確實毆打了蘇某。

sentences.english: Many in Baltimore believe he was beaten by local criminal gangs.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾的摩的許多人認爲他被當地的犯罪團伙毆打了。

sentences.english: You mean you want me to beat up Jews with my truncheon and catch the Gestapo spirit.
sentences.chinese: 你的意思是想讓我和蓋世太保一樣用警棍毆打猶太人。

sentences.english: The robbers clobbered the shopkeeper to make him open the safe.
sentences.chinese: 強盜們毆打店主迫使他打開保險櫃。

sentences.english: Unlike alcohol, it does not result in bar fights or wife beating.
sentences.chinese: 與酒精不同，它不會引起酒吧打架或毆打妻子。

sentences.english: In what the Club views as a severe over-reaction, local police handed out indiscriminate beatings to United supporters.
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部認爲當地警方執法過當並毆打了曼聯球迷。

sentences.english: There were also marks from beatings, he confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 屍體上也有被毆打的痕跡，他證實。

definition: to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to set on fire/to commit arson
to open fire/to shoot a gun
to dispute/to disagree/to argue opinionatedly/to wrangle
